snippet.title: EA SPORTS WRC Modes & Features Deep Dive
snippet.description:
Pre-order EA SPORTS™ WRC and get extra content: http://x.ea.com/78133

Learn about the exciting modes and features you’ll experience across EA SPORTS™ WRC in another Deep Dive! 

--

0:00 EA SPORTS WRC Modes & Features Deep Dive
0:13 Career
1:28 Builder
2:48 Moments
3:50 Regularity Rally
4:24 Rally School
4:54 Championship
5:13 Quick Play Solo (Custom Events)
5:29 Quick Play Multiplayer
5:39 Clubs
5:57 Time Trial
6:13 Handling, Cars & Locations

--

Get to know Career, Builder, and Moments - the headline game modes in WRC - as well as many more ways to enjoy the world of rally.

Get behind the wheel starting November 3, 2023 on Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation®5, or PC! Pre-order* EA SPORTS™ WRC and receive 3-day early access, all five VIP Rally Pass seasons, and the 3x Team Apparel Pack: http://x.ea.com/78133

EA SPORTS™ WRC lets you build the car of your dreams in the all-new official video game of the FIA World Rally Championship, the first developed by the award-winning team behind the DiRT Rally series. 

Design and drive your dream rally car with the debut of Builder mode, race and overcome recent events alongside real-world highlights and nostalgic throwbacks in Moments mode, or battle the elements across dirt, snow, and asphalt in the pursuit of the perfect run. 

Take to the stage and get the latest info at: https://ea.com/games/ea-sports-wrc/wrc/ 

--

Follow us everywhere: https://linktree.com/easportswrc

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/easportswrc

--

#EASPORTSWRC #EASPORTS #WRC 

*Conditions and restrictions apply. See https://www.ea.com/games/ea-sports-wrc/wrc/disclaimers for details.
